creditline: Lent by the Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, Kansas City, Missouri, Nelson Trust
description: deep round bowl on raised foot with slightly flared rim, distinct line of transition at lower body; two gold and three black repairs at rim; circular area of unglazed stoneware offset from center around foot and into body; tan glaze, darker band at lower body
medium: Stoneware with ash glaze, Karatus ware
title: Tea bowl (chawan)
